Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have done some searching with no luck to see if it is possible to change the real fuels UI size it is small on my graphics setup I have the other UI's adjusted through the KSP settings but have had no luck with real fuels UI. Thanks for any help.

 

David.
Welcome to the forum @DaveB, your issue has been moved from Add-on Releases to Add-on Discussion.
